property.name: schedule
property.label: Crontab schedule
property.description: Specify the daily crontab schedule to execute this policy. The pattern is a list of six single space-separated fields: representing second, minute, hour, day, month, weekday. Month and weekday names can be given as the first three letters of the English names. Example patterns: '0 0 * * * *' = the top of every hour of every day, '0 0 14 * * SAT,SUN' = 14 o'clock on each weekend day, '0 0 9-17 * * MON-FRI' = on the hour nine-to-five weekdays, '0 0 0 1 * *' = every 1st of month at midnight.
